content: Would it be a nice idea to include an example column to the existing linkifier table in the settings page? For an average user who isn't familiar with regex, it might be uncomfortable to understand and use the linkifier patterns.
We just say #123 for the pattern that uses this.
Additional info would be much more helpful than just #(?P<id>[0-9]{2,8}).
A related issue here is that the placeholders in the input boxes are kinda helpful, but you can't actually edit them, and as soon as you start typing, they disappear.
I wish we just had more canned options here, like "numeric issue number with alpha prefix". Fortunately, most of this pain only affects admins.

Ultimately, I think we're going to want to rework that system to have a simpler interface, but it's a hard problem to do so without losing power (and the vast majority of past complaints we've gotten about that feature have been thinks users wanted to linkify that weren't supported)
